# Ruby on Rails Blog Project - Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a simple blog application built with Ruby on Rails demonstrating MVC architecture, database integration, and full CRUD operations.

- [x] Create project instructions file
- [x] Scaffold Rails project structure

## âœ… Project Created Successfully!

All files have been created. To run the application:

1. Install dependencies: `bundle install`
2. Setup database: `rails db:create && rails db:migrate && rails db:seed`
3. Start server: `rails server`
4. Visit: http://localhost:3000
